# === AUTHENTICATION ===
# Flask Secret Key (auto-generated if not set)
FLASK_SECRET_KEY=
SESSION_SECRET=
=======
# === AUTHENTICATION ===
# Flask Secret Key (auto-generated if not set)
FLASK_SECRET_KEY=
# SESSION_SECRET is REQUIRED for production auth and session management.
# The application will fail to start if this is not set.
SESSION_SECRET=
